Build.comm: Well built and easy to use.

cont.entity_a: Solid with great aesthetics and feel. Built well and offers good quality.
cont.entity_b: Tough as nails, easy to adjust, well built. Super solid build and easy to use.

cont.entity_a: Right size for around the house, not too small or overly large and heavy.
cont.entity_b: Smaller than expected but works well for small household jobs.

cont.entity_a: Easy to use one-handed and doesn't slip like cheaper wrenches.
cont.entity_b: Does not slip or strip teeth.

cont.entity_a: Heavy, but the jaws operate smoothly. Heavy but usable by smaller individuals due to the extra weight.
cont.entity_b: Hefty but made of solid steel. Heavy and sturdy with a warranty that guarantees a free replacement if the handle breaks.

cont.entity_a: High quality with sharp teeth that grip well.
cont.entity_b: Strong grip, especially on small parts.
Not the least expensive, but durable enough to last a lifetime.

cont.entity_a: Heavy cast iron construction with virtually nothing that can break. Can withstand heavy use without damage.
cont.entity_b: Exterior paint chipped after a drop, causing sharp edges.

cont.entity_a: Has a lifetime warranty honored by Irwin.
cont.entity_b: Lifetime warranty available. Heavy and sturdy with a warranty that guarantees a free replacement if the handle breaks.

Performance.comm: Does the job it was designed to do very well.

cont.entity_b: Handles all jobs around the house and garage.

cont.entity_a: Handle clean of burs with sharp dies.
Makes hands smell unpleasantly after use.
